text:
RELIGION

Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple: Thirupallioda thiruvizha, Namperumal purappadu from sanctum sanctorum in pallakku, 6.30 a.m.; reaching Renga Vilasa Asthana Mandapam, 8.30 a.m.; purappadu from the mandapam in Irattai prabai, 6.30 p.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 8 p.m.; purappadu, 9 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 9.15 p.m.

Sri Kanchi Sankara Mutt: Gayathri homam, North Street, Thiruvanaikovil, 8 a.m.

Srimad Ubhaya Vedantacharya Peetam: “Bhagavata Dasamaskandam” by R. Anantharaman, 294, Sathara Street, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Varasidhi Vinayagar Temple: “Srimad Ramayanam” by V. Mani, Ganapathi Nagar, Thiruvanaikovil, 6 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Lakshmi Narayana Swamy Temple, Melur Road, Srirangam, 5.30 p.m.; 122, South Chithirai Street, 6.45 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama nama parayanam, 24, Cheran Salai, Anand Nagar, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Thirukkural Peravai: Thiruvalluvar thiruvizha, competitions for students and presentation of awards, Government Boys Higher Secondary School, Manachanallur, 9.15 a.m.

Indian Medical Association: Pongal festival, presentation of Dr. AR. Ganesan Arts Award to S.Ponnammal and Dr. S. Palaniyandi Trust Tamil scholar award to A. Arivunambi, IMA Hall, 6.05 p.m.

GENERAL

Bharathidasan Institute of Management: Sanjeevani, S. Gopinath, Executive Director, BHEL, Tiruchi, chief guest, MD Hall, BHEL campus, 9 a.m.

Bishop Heber College Department of Social Work: Medical camp, South Ariyavur, 10 a.m.

Tiruchi Arivalar Peravai: Special address by E. Susai, professor, St. Joseph’s College, Sri Sivananda Balalaya, Ramalinga Nagar South, 10.30 a.m.

Makkal Athikaram: Special anti-liquor conference, Kaliappan, presides, Uzhavar Sandhai grounds, Anna Nagar, 4 p.m.

U2Can: Free counselling for MBBS, engineering courses abroad, V Cross Fort Station Road, 10 a.m.

Trichy Plus: Quiz contest, V Cross Fort Station Road, Thillai Nagar, 5 p.m.

M.A.M. College of Engineering and Technology Department of Computer Science and Engineering: Faculty lecture series on Python programming, 10 a.m.

Tiruchi District Retired Government Officials Association: Meeting, Bishop Heber Higher Secondary School, Teppakulam, 3.30 p.m.
title: tiruchi today
